select c.f_id,c.f_name,f_type,cct.f_name as f_type_name,f_quota,f_begin_time,f_end_time,f_entry_terminal_time,f_bill,f_background ,f_province,(SELECT f_region_name from t_sys_cfg_region where f_region_num = c.f_province) as f_province_name ,f_city,(SELECT f_region_name from t_sys_cfg_region where f_region_num = c.f_city) as f_city_name ,f_addr,f_note,f_detail,f_call,f_cost,f_cost_explain,f_status,f_create_time,f_video from t_campaign c left join t_campaign_cfg_type cct on c.f_type=cct.f_id where f_status > 0 and f_status < 6 order by f_begin_time desc limit #{start}, #{size}
